actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension and Insurance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension and Insurance

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for dependency and indemnity compensation for the surviving spouse of a Commandant of the Coast Guard at the same rate as provided for surviving spouses of other uniformed service chiefs.

summary.text: Entitles the surviving spouse of a commandant of the Coast Guard who dies a service-connected death to an increased rate of dependency and indemnity compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for dependency and indemnity compensation for the surviving spouse of a Commandant of the Coast Guard at the same rate as provided for surviving spouses of other uniformed service chiefs.
